official_title: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-Label Extension Study of Zilucoplan in Subjects With Generalized Myasthenia Gravis
inclusion_criteria:
* Completion of a qualifying zilucoplan study
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * With the exception of a prior zilucoplan trial, participation in another concurrent clinical trial involving an experimental therapeutic intervention (participation in observational studies and/or registry studies is permitted)
